data.name: Tale of Serendipity
data.detailed_description:
About


On a stormy night, Carla has a strange dream that keeps her worried. To the concern of her dream is added the disappearance of Canuto, her cat.

In some way she can't explain, she feels the two are connected...

Veilchental


Veilchental is a small remote and boring town. Its inhabitants are simple and live a quiet life. As every year, the inauguration day of the town is celebrated and all the residents attend the party.

What seemed to be another normal year with his usual party gradually turns into a nightmare, revealing a dark secret buried for many years...

How to survive?




On this blackboard is everything I found about Canuto and this town and its people who seem increasingly strange to me.



When I feel like my heart is about to explode, I know that danger is near.



I have to stay hidden so they don't find me.



If I make a wrong decision, there may be no turning back.

Gameplay


Guide Carla on an atypical day: Through the woods, her house and school at night. Search and investigate different evidence that will help you find Padfoot and discover the truth.

  • Find and investigate clues to find your missing feline
  • Avoid your enemies, you can't defend yourself!
  • If they kill you, it's over. You will have only one life, be careful.
  • Your decisions will affect the end, will you find your lost pet? Will you discover the secrets of Veilchental? Or will you just go home and accept fate?
  • Investigate scenarios that change slightly with each game started.

data.short_description: A game of suspense and adventure, where you will take the role of Carla in search of her feline lost by a seemingly harmless people
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 o superior
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 o superior
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
